scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:components && npm run build:js
scripts.dev: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:components & npm run dev:js
scripts.dev:full: npm run dev:vite & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:components & ./.venv/bin/python -m agentpm.web.app
scripts.debug:full: concurrently --kill-others --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,yellow,green" --names "VITE,CSS,FLASK,LOGS" "npm run debug:vite" "npm run watch:css" "npm run debug:flask" "npm run debug:logs"
scripts.dev:hot-no-debug: concurrently --kill-others --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,yellow" --names "VITE,CSS,FLASK" "npm run dev:vite" "npm run watch:css" "FLASK_ENV=development FLASK_DEBUG=1 FLASK_PORT=5003 ./.venv/bin/python -m agentpm.web.app"
scripts.debug:attach: echo 'Attach your debugger to localhost:5678' && sleep infinity
scripts.debug:db: ./.venv/bin/python -c "from agentpm.web.app import get_database_service; db = get_database_service(); exec('with db.connect() as conn: print(\"Database connection test: OK\")')"
scripts.debug:routes: ./.venv/bin/python -c "from agentpm.web.app import app; [print(f'{rule.rule} -> {rule.endpoint}') for rule in app.url_map.iter_rules()]"
scripts.debug:ports: lsof -i :3000,3001,5000,5002,5003,5678 || echo 'No processes found on debug ports'
scripts.debug:restart: npm run debug:clean && sleep 2 && npm run debug:full
